features: 【Our Cushion Designed for U】Memobarco patented contoured double "U" cut-out memory foam seat cushion is ergonomically designed to accommodate your body curve, keeps hips and tailbone away from hard sitting surfaces to release pressure on your lower body. Provides effective hip, leg, thigh support for all-day sitting comfort, improves sitting posture, and helps reduce tailbone, coccyx, sciatic pain

【Premium Material】Our sciatica pain relief pillow adopts molded slow rebound memory foam that is helpful for distributing your weight evenly; Includes a detachable and machine washable cover that is made of skin-friendly and wear-resistant polyester fabric on top, breathable mesh on the sides, and black anti-skid fabric bottom to ensure the cushion keeps stable in a seat

【Enjoy Comfort Anywhere】 Measures 18.5" x 15.5" x 4.0", our tailbone pressure relief seat cushion fits most chairs, and can be used as chair cushions for office desks, computer and gaming chairs, dining chairs, or car, truck, train, airplane, travel, stadium, bleacher, wheelchairs seat cushions, etc. It's a chair pad that suits everyone, including office workers, long-time drivers, pregnant women, teachers, students, the elderly, people need wheelchair, etc

【Ideal Gift for The One】Our pressure relief seat cushion is an ideal gift for the elderly, families, partners, teachers, or friends on Birthday, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, Housewarming gift, etc

【After-Sales Service】If you have any questions about the office chair cushions, please feel free to contact us; You can also search "memory foam lumbar pillow" in the Memobarco store to find the matching back support; [WARM TIPs]: For your health, please take 5-10 minutes to get up and move after 1 hour of continuous work

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Soft & Skin-friendly Perfect combo of inner molded slow rebound memory foam and outer polyester fabric cover. Gives you all-day soft support while skin-friendly and wear-resistant. Breathable Mesh Fabric The breathable mesh cloth on the side offers better ventilation, decreasing heat accumulation and sweating, even in hot summer. Non-slip Bottom The bottom of the seat cushion is designed to the non-slip rubber, keeping it from sliding when in use. More comfortable to sit. Detachable & Machine Washable The cloth cover of the office chair cushion can be detached and machine washable. Easy to maintain it and keep it clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Relieves Pain and Gives the Right Support
reviews.reviewText: This little "pillow" is more than what I could have imagined or designed.I say pillow because before this cushion, I used to use a pillow and no pillow worked well. In fact, it seemed like they made it worse. It was a toss-up on which was worse, nothing at all or the wrong one. My legs and back would hurt within 5-10 minutes and I couldn't even check email in that time!But, with this cushion, it is like sitting on clouds in comparison! This cushion is designed for my body, with the memory foam fitting perfectly to the shape of my body and especially over time, as I use it.Now, I have to admit, at first, it was not that comfortable, in the first 30 seconds and I had wondered if I had made a mistake. But, it was also cold, as I had just pulled it out of the box, and it had been delivered in almost freezing (by my standards LOL) temperature. So, that does make a difference. If you wait for it to reach room temperature, that makes a difference. Also, if you sit on the cushion, your body heat warms up the cushion AND the cushion starts to change to the shape of your body, even within minutes!The firmness of the cushion was a major plus, as well. I thought that something cushy and soft would be the most comfortable, but as we learn in life, that is the opposite of what is best for our bodies and what actually helps with the pain. Even as I type this, I can feel my back getting the support it needs, and it is as if this surge of "thankfulness" is going up my spine because it is the way it is supposed to be, thanks to the firmness of this cushion. If my bones could speak, they definitely would be saying, "Thank you!" So, I will say it for them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ergonomic design. Right amount of “firm”. Nice color. No handle.
reviews.reviewText: I am on a never ending quest to find the perfect seat cushion… this one isn’t perfect, but it’s pretty good. Ergonomic design is supportive and relatively comfortable. It’s a little firmer than other cushions I’ve used, which I actually prefer because it doesn’t get “crushed” in the first 10 minutes. Like all cushions (in my opinion), you still need to get up and let it expand again to provide longer lasting support. I’ve flipped it over and have sat on the rubbery side as well as the “up” side, and that works too. It has a correct orientation, but I’ve found I can use it turned both ways and still have it be effective. I’m 5’11” / 175 and the size if fine for me, but to be honest I have a pretty small area that comes into contact with the cushion. I would have liked to see a handle of some sort built in so could carry it with me to a sporting event or theater, but that’s a small nitpick. I like to switch cushions out once or twice throughout the day, and this one is a good option to have in my stable of effective seat cushions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Squishes down too much
reviews.reviewText: I find this squishes down too much and slants my body forward making me feel like I'm falling out of the chair.It appears to be well made but not as much support as I had hoped for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wasn't sure because of the shape, but I was wrong.
reviews.reviewText: I have a few medical issues (degenerative disc disease, nerve compression) that make sitting painful for more than 20 minutes at a time on pc chair without a cushion(s).I was previously using a big square seat cushion that was semi comfortable for maybe an hour at most.With this cushion I can stay at the pc much longer without as much pain ( a few hours). I was kind of skeptical because of it's odd shape but it does seem to help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great when positioned correctly
reviews.reviewText: I have back and hip injuries and with the cold weather, my pain has flared up. I was excited to try this and hopefully get relief.When it is positioned correctly and i sit for several hours, I do not feel nearly as sore as I do without it. It works as advertised. My main complaint is that the bottom is not quite grippy enough. Throughout the day it shifts and slides back, likely due to my chair having a slight tilt but also likely due to not having a strong enough gripping mechanism to hold it in place. When it’s not positioned correctly it does nothing. If you have a flat hard surface chair, like a dining chair, I think it would work better than the mesh chair I currently have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Husband uses this on his gaming chair that I also got from Amazon. He loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This seat cushion is INCREDIBLE!
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion is incredible! It provides all of the proper support in all of the right places. The first moment I sat in it, I knew it was awesome! I can stand up without hurting after sitting in it for a while. It helps my hips, buttocks, and lower back.As I move from one office chair to another in another room, I always take this cushion with me. It is more important than the chair.This is one of my favorite items I have ordered in the past year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars OK for the price point
reviews.reviewText: I have a few of these and the shape of this one doesn't quite offer as much comfort for me personally as the type with a slightly more open back section. Support is good but could be a bit firmer. I'm 170lbs and I feel like this cushion flattens out too much but it does get back into shape pretty quickly whenever I stand. There was no noticeable odor when I removed the cushion from its packaging.Overall a decent cushion at $35
